# DECORATOR::DECOR_SET_BOOL

## Summary
Add or update a BOOL decorator on an object

## Parameters
* **ITEM_INDEX** guid: Object to remove decorators from
* **STRING** decoratorName: Name of the decorator
* **BOOL** value: Value of the decorator

## Returns
* **BOOL**: true if completed successfuly else false

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This function sets metadata of type bool to specified entity.
